Title: Cam Akers' second-half surge highlights Los Angeles Rams' promising 2020 rookie class
Description: THOUSAND OAKS, Calif. -- It was Week 13 when rookie running back Cam Akers found a rhythm, scoring a touchdown for a third consecutive game and helping deliver the Los Angeles Rams a key 38-23 win over the Arizona Cardinals. Stuck playing a role in a ...
Author: ESPN
